title: Plastic Impacts Land Animals Too | Plastic Pollution Coalition
body: Plastic Impacts Land Animals Too. August 27, 2015. We know by now that plastic pollution is turning our oceans into a toxic "plastic soup," in which fish, mammals, sea birds and even zooplankton are literally choking to death.
